message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $180?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $180. How about we meet in the middle at $190?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $175?
I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $185?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $185 is still a bit too high for me. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $180?
I've already offered $180 before, and I'm not willing to go back to that price. How about we meet at $182.50?
